title: Zero-Day Alert: Three Critical Ivanti CSA Vulnerabilities Actively Exploited
description: Ivanti has warned that three new security vulnerabilities impacting its Cloud Service Appliance (CSA) have come under active exploitation in the wild. The zero-day flaws are being weaponized in conjunction with another flaw in CSA that the company patched last month, the Utah-based software services provider said.
